info.title: Headings
info.author: Romaap
info.description: Hold up the ball as many times as possible
info.details:
Try to get the highest score by holding up the ball. Head with the A button and move by pointing at the screen.
Reset the ball with B.
If you catch the slowmotion powerup, the ball will be slowed down.
The slowmotion will wear off after 10 seconds or when you lose the ball
